title: Monitoring electromagnetic signals in the brain with MRI

title_detail.value: Monitoring electromagnetic signals in the brain with MRI

summary: MIT engineers have devised a new technique to detect either electrical activity or optical signals in the brain, using a minimally invasive technique based on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).

summary_detail.value: MIT engineers have devised a new technique to detect either electrical activity or optical signals in the brain, using a minimally invasive technique based on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).
